name: VIX (Gedcreeper)
description:
On a quiet planet, somewhere in the solar system, the peaceful alien Vix sleeps in the woods. With a sudden crash, an army of metal soldiers  came from the sky, quickly setting up sprawling cities and unleashing dangerous weapons across the planet. It's all up to Vix to destroy their bases, free his friends, and send the mysterious invaders packing!

If the .exe registers as a virus, it's a false positive created by the software.
